Headless Stack Overflow Daily Attendance


Stack Overflow awards a gold badge for checking into the site for 100 days in a row. I wrote a simple script which uses the phantom.js headless browser to log in and read the progress of the badge. Then I set this script up to run every day.

Randomly Generate a Field of Convex Polygons


Sounds easy, but it's a bit harder than it looks, especially to make it look good. This was a part of a class assignment turned wild.

Making a Home Server from an Old Computer


I had an old computer and GoDaddy Shared Hosting. You can infer what happened.

Use MongoDB in Express Middleware to Store Node.js Website Traffic


While I don't really need to store any information about the site, I wanted some MongoDB experience. This middleware allows me to log your info to my database!

p5 Games


Games in p5.js. This is a purely javascript engine which runs applications similar to what you might find with a flash player.
